name: CMMC 2.0
description: Cybersecurity Maturity Model Certification 2.0 for DoD Contractors

deliverables.title: AC.L1-3.1.1 - Authorized Access Control
deliverables.description: Limit information system access to authorized users
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%unauthorized%' OR title LIKE '%access control%'

deliverables.title: AC.L1-3.1.2 - Transaction Access Control
deliverables.description: Limit system access to authorized transactions and functions

deliverables.title: AC.L2-3.1.5 - Least Privilege
deliverables.description: Employ the principle of least privilege
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%privilege%' OR title LIKE '%escalation%'

deliverables.title: IA.L1-3.5.1 - Identification
deliverables.description: Identify information system users and processes

deliverables.title: IA.L1-3.5.2 - Authentication
deliverables.description: Authenticate users and processes before system access
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%authentication%' OR title LIKE '%password%'

deliverables.title: SC.L1-3.13.1 - Boundary Protection
deliverables.description: Monitor, control, and protect organizational communications at boundaries
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%firewall%' OR title LIKE '%boundary%'

deliverables.title: SC.L2-3.13.8 - Cryptographic Protection
deliverables.description: Implement cryptographic mechanisms to prevent unauthorized disclosure
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%encryption%' OR title LIKE '%cryptograph%'

deliverables.title: SC.L2-3.13.11 - CUI Encryption
deliverables.description: Employ FIPS-validated cryptography for CUI protection

deliverables.title: SI.L1-3.14.1 - Flaw Remediation
deliverables.description: Identify, report, and correct system flaws in a timely manner
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE severity IN ('critical', 'high')

deliverables.title: SI.L1-3.14.2 - Malicious Code Protection
deliverables.description: Provide protection from malicious code at appropriate locations

deliverables.title: AU.L2-3.3.1 - System Auditing
deliverables.description: Create and retain audit logs to enable monitoring and analysis

deliverables.title: IR.L2-3.6.1 - Incident Handling
deliverables.description: Establish incident handling capability including preparation and detection

deliverables.title: CM.L2-3.4.1 - Baseline Configuration
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%misconfiguration%' OR title LIKE '%baseline%'

deliverables.title: MP.L2-3.8.1 - Media Protection
deliverables.description: Protect system media containing CUI both paper and digital
